The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

Romanos, Zaragoza, Aragon

Katherine Dau

Verified

On August 25 each year, the town processes to the hermitage of Remedios.

Works cited

  1. “Romanos (Zaragoza),” Wikipedia.
  2. “Romanos” Turismo de Zaragoza.
